GPURequestAdapter.summary:
NOTE Experimental The requestAdapter() method of the
interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that fulfills with a object instance. From this you can request a , adapter info, features, and limits.

remarks.para: Note that the user agent chooses whether to return an adapter. If so, it chooses according to the provided options. If no options are provided, the device will provide access to the default adapter, which is usually good enough for most purposes.

GPURequestAdapter.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that fulfills with a object instance if the request is successful.requestAdapter() will resolve to null if an appropriate adapter is not available.
